posts.post_title: Ty Cobb Bat off Shoulder for Sale***SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hi ~

I have a PSA 4 Ty Cobb Bat off Shoulder I'd like to sell. I'd prefer postal money order over paypal to avoid fees. I am asking $1500 for it. Please email me for scans of card. [url]kilaartist@aol.com[/url]. Please email if seriously interested. I need to sell for my wedding. Thanks

Doug

THANKS FOR LOOKING>>>CARD HAS BEEN SOLD*****
